resources.string: Recommend the Comprehensive Scan process to ensure your home is completely safe
Find hidden cameras connected to the same wifi networ
Searching for infrared hidden in the dark
Step 2: Scan device on the same Wi-Fi
Step 4: Scan Infrared Camera and Detector Camera
Follow these steps if you suspect there is a hidden camera in your room. The app will attempt to scan and detect it, helping you stay safe and comfortable.
Scan device on the same Wi-Fi
The process is not complete, are you sure you want to end it?
Turn off all the lights in the room and proceed to the next step to scan for magnetic fields and infrared cameras in your room
If you see a white light in dark room which you cannot see with naked eyes, this may be a Hidden Cam
1. Visual Inspection: Carefully examine the room for any unusual objects like:
2. Use a Infrared Camera: Turn off the lights in the room and use infrared camera to scan the area. The camera lens might reflect light, making it easier to detect.
3. Listen for Unusual Sounds : Listen for faint noises: Some cameras may emit faint noises, such as clicks or motor sounds when operating. Stay quiet and listen for anything unusual.
4. Request a Security Check : If you suspect a hidden camera, you can request a security professional to inspect the room.
1. Visual Inspection: Look for unusual or out-of-place objects: Carefully inspect items like :
Small objects like soap dispensers, shampoo bottles, or LED lights

2. Check for two-way mirrors: Use the \"fingernail test\" to check for two-way mirrors. Place your fingernail against the mirror’s surface. If there is a gap between your finger and its reflection, it\'s likely a normal mirror. If there is no gap, it could be a two-way mirror with a camera behind it.
5. Use a Infrared Camera: Turn off the lights in the room and use infrared camera to scan the area. The camera lens might reflect light, making it easier to detect.
1. Check common hiding spots: Inspect items such as
2. Cameras can be disguised in everyday objects like alarm clocks, TV set-top boxes, or even inside light bulbs
The hidden camera may connect to strange wifi networks to transmit data.
You have reached the maximum number of Wi-Fi scans
Some hidden cameras will connect to the same wifi network as yours, scanning for suspicious devices.
You are not connected to any Wi-Fi
For production and development, we need funding, one of which comes from advertisment revenue

1. To remove ads, you can support us by purchasing the premium version or the ad-removed version.\n\n2. Contact us by email to be considered for participation in the pilot program, from which you can use versions with less ads but may not be optimized for performance.
What Ads type do we use?

We are associated with many ad network partners and the largest is Google Ad for major ad formats

- Full screen ads interspersed between screens
- Banner, native ads are customized as a component of AD (usually with a yellow label)
We are always trying to balance the user experience and advertisment
For a better experience, we provide enhanced versions or remove ads.
- The application does not work as described \n- Application crashes after payment \n- The app still shows ads after successful payment

Step1: Contact us via email "piontech.feedback@gmail.com" with title "About refund Issue" 

Step2: provide us with the e-invoice, which will have the ID "GPA.33..." in the email you used to pay with google pay

Step3: We will check the problems you have, if it is in the "refund approved cases", we will process it in about 3-5 working days depending on the actual conditions.

The amount after refund will be processed by google's system and transferred back to your e-wallet.
- You can completely use the core features of the application without paying any fees \n- If you clear the data of the application, the ad may appear again once when relaunching the application.
Select remove ad icon and press buy, we will accept your payment through google pay system
